description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**國立臺灣師範大學** **National Taiwan Normal University**

**英語** **(****一****)** **課程綱要** **English (II) syllabus**

Instructor: Huynh Hai-Long (Harry) / 黃海龍

Email: longhhuynh@ntnu.edu.tw

Class time: 週五 Friday, 3 – 4 / 10:20am – 12:20pm, 本部樸303 Main Campus Pu 303

*   **Course description**

This course aims to boost students’ English proficiency by strengthening their four English skills. In this course, there will be a wider variety of activities which motivate students to use English in their everyday life activities and enhance their communicative abilities. Students are expected to be more autonomous and active in their own learning.

*   **Course objectives:**

The course is designed to

1.  Develop students’ skills in English
2.  Enhance students’ knowledge of vocabulary and writing skills
3.  Build students’ confidence in writing in English
4.  Develop students’ teamwork and autonomy
5.  Broaden cultural and intercultural knowledge

*   **Textbook**

Macintyre, P., & Bohlke, D. (2020). _Reading Explorer 2, Third edition_. Boston, MA: National Geographic Learning.

*   Grading policy and course requirements

1.  Grading policy

1.  Attendance and participation: 10%
2.  In-class activities and quizzes: 30%
3.  TOEIC test attendance & Self-study: 10%
4.  Mid-term test: 20%
5.  Final test: 30%

TOEIC Listening & Reading日期: 2022/03/26 – 2022/04/01 (供大一學生測驗 – 免費)

TOEIC Speaking & Writing日期: 2022/05/28 (供LR 通過CEFR B2者測驗)

1.  Course requirements 課程條件

*   _Attendance and participation (10%)_ _點名_

Class attendance is required and strictly checked. Students are expected to come to class every week, except for (a) hospitalized cases; or (b) emergencies; or (c) authorized absences. For these exceptions, you must show evidence **and/or** an absence form (學生請假系統). Any absence, beside the exceptions, results in _1 point_ deducted in the attendance/participation score.

*   _In-class quizzes (30%)_ _在教室小考_

Students are expected to take quizzes during class time. The quizzes are about describing photographs orally (口試) or in writing (筆試). Students will be informed one week in advance. For example, if one quiz is on March 26th, the teacher will remind the students of the quiz on March 19th.

*   _TOEIC test attendance and self-study (10%)_ _多益考試和自學_

Students are required to take the TOEIC test. This test will take place in March 2022. The score on the TOEIC test, however, does NOT make up any percentage in your final grade.

Students are also asked to self-study the TOEIC test materials. This will be discussed in class.

*   _Mid-term test (20%) and final test (30%)_ _期中考_ _和_ _期末考_

For both the mid-term and the final tests, students will take a written test and an oral test. The questions are based on [B1 Preliminary](https://www.cambridgeenglish.org/exams-and-tests/preliminary/exam-format/) test format.

\+ Mid-term: Students will answer questions on reading comprehension, vocabulary, and a writing task in the paper test. There will be **20** items in total for this paper test. After that, they will be tested orally. The teacher will ask them to describe one color photograph. Students record themselves and upload their own recording onto the link given by the teacher.

+Final: There will be questions on reading, vocabulary, grammar, and writing. The test will have **40** items. After that, students will take an oral test (different from the mid-term). In this oral test, they will answer questions on everyday topic and then describe one color photograph. This oral test will be done face-to-face.
